text: The 1885 New York Giants season was the franchise's 3rd season. The team finished in second place, 2 games behind the Chicago White Stockings. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
